reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable and makes the class interesting. However, her exams are a bit challenging.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Professor Williams explains concepts well, but sometimes moves too quickly through the material.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've ever had! She is very clear in her explanations and always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow, and he rarely answers emails. Would not recommend.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Makes programming fun and accessible for beginners.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a great lecturer, but the homework is quite tough. Still, I learned a lot.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Very boring lectures and the exams are unfair. I wouldn't take her class again.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Average experience. Dr. Davis knows his stuff but lacks enthusiasm in his teaching.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Literature
reviews.review: She has a passion for literature that is contagious! Really enjoyed her class.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Very dry lectures and doesn't engage the students. Not a great experience.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Hernandez is knowledgeable and friendly, but her quizzes can be tricky.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Philosophy
reviews.review: Amazing professor with thought-provoking lectures. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Statistics for Business
reviews.review: She is okay, but her lectures are quite monotonous. The textbook is essential.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Dr. Walker's class is challenging but fair. A good professor overall.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Very passionate about the environment and makes the class engaging.

reviews.subject: American Politics
reviews.review: Dr. Allen's classes are mostly lectures with little student interaction. Not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Wonderful professor! She encourages creativity and provides great feedback.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Statistics
reviews.review: Solid professor. He makes statistics easier to understand, but his grading is tough.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: She's decent, but her lectures are a bit repetitive. The class was okay.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Very hard class with little help from the professor. Wouldn't recommend unless you're a math genius.
